plot: Bart and Lisa return home following a traumatic incident at Kamp Krusty, putting an end to Homer and Marge's sexual encounters.

When Bart comes home from Kamp Krusty early, he is so terrified, he has to sleep in his parent's bed. But with Bart in their bed it means Homer and Marge can't make love to each other anymore. Without this, Homer feels that he is more successful, but when he tells Marge the news she takes him to a clinic.
